title: Olli Salumeria Americana, LLC Recalls Pork Products Due To Misbranding
summary: EDITOR'S NOTE: On Sept. 11, 2015, the release was updated to include additional distribution locations. WASHINGTON, Sept. 8, 2015 The U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today that Olli Salumeria Americana, LLC., an Oceanside, Calif., establishment, is recalling approximately 5,391...
